pageContext.claim: “We took over -- a lot of bad things were happening, and the economy was not doing well. It was heading in the wrong direction. You remember that. It was going to go bad, and then we opened up with the regulation cuts and all of the other things we've done, including the big tax cut.”
pageContext.analysis: The country was not going in the wrong direction and in fact was in the longest expansion in U.S. history.
